newsitem.title: USA: Nevada Assembly defeats toll road bond proposal.
newsitem.headline: Nevada Assembly defeats toll road bond proposal.

text.p: Nevada's Assembly has defeated a bill that would have allowed state and local agencies to build toll roads with revenue bonds, the bill's sponsor said on Friday.
Assembly Bill 403 was approved earlier this week, but the vote was later reversed by the state Assembly after an amendment was proposed, the Nevada Taxpayers Association said.
Assembly Bill 403 would have allowed state and local governments to build toll roads with proceeds from the sale of revenue bonds. Toll revenues would have been used to repay the bondholders.
